name: Victory (Canceled)
blurb: A World War II, team-based, action-strategy game where you collect companies of units and battle in quick online matches

rewards.reward: No Reward
PRIVATE FIRST CLASS \u2022 You will get a huge Thank You and a CUSTOM DIGITAL VICTORY WALLPAPER.
CORPORAL \u2022 Discounted CORPORAL tier for early backers only!
CORPORAL \u2022 \r\nDiscounted CORPORAL tier for early backers only!
CORPORAL \u2022 \r\nDIGITAL DOWNLOAD COPY of Victory!  Additionally, you get access to a CUSTOM DIGITAL VICTORY WALLPAPER and are guaranteed CLOSED BETA ACCESS.

CORPORAL (IMMEDIATE ACCESS)  \u2022 Limited offer! You get everything in CORPORAL level plus  ACCESS TO SPECIAL PLAYTEST SESSIONS with the dev team after Victory is successfully funded. You\u2019ll be able to play an early prototype version of the game!

SERGEANT (IMMEDIATE ACCESS) \u2022 Limited offer! You get everything in SERGEANT level plus ACCESS TO SPECIAL PLAYTEST SESSIONS with the dev team after Victory is successfully funded. You\u2019ll be able to play an early prototype version of the game!

SERGEANT \u2022 Includes CORPORAL level. You also get 3 BONUS PACKS of in-game tokens and 3 MONTHS OF BOOSTED EXPERIENCE + WEALTH GAIN. Additionally receive a DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK by Frank Klepacki and a custom VICTORY RINGTONE. Finally, you will receive a Kickstarter exclusive FOUNDER TITLE in game and in our forums.

LIEUTENANT (IMMEDIATE ACCESS) \u2022 Limited offer! You get everything in LIEUTENANT level plus ACCESS TO SPECIAL PLAYTEST SESSIONS with the dev team after Victory is successfully funded. You\u2019ll be able to play an early prototype version of the game!

OBERLEUTNANT (IMMEDIATE ACCESS) \u2022 Limited offer! You get everything in OBERLEUTNANT level plus ACCESS TO SPECIAL PLAYTEST SESSIONS with the dev team after Victory is successfully funded. You\u2019ll be able to play an early prototype version of the game!

LIEUTENANT \u2022 \r\nIncludes SERGEANT level.  Lieutenant backers get a Kickstarter-only LIMITED EDITION BRITISH CRUSADER III HERO tank.  In addition, backers also get +2 BONUS PACKS (5 total), guaranteed ALPHA ACCESS and a BONUS DIGITAL GAME COPY to hand out to a friend.

OBERLEUTNANT \u2022 \r\nIncludes SERGEANT level.  Oberleutnant backers also get a Kickstarter-only LIMITED EDITION GERMAN PANZER IV HERO tank.  In addition, backers also get +2 BONUS PACKS (5 total), guaranteed ALPHA ACCESS and a BONUS DIGITAL GAME COPY to hand out to a friend.

CAPTAIN (IMMEDIATE ACCESS) \u2022 Limited offer! You get everything in CAPTAIN level plus ACCESS TO SPECIAL PLAYTEST SESSIONS with the dev team after Victory is successfully funded. You\u2019ll be able to play an early prototype version of the game!

CAPTAIN \u2022 \r\nIncludes SERGEANT level. You also get both limited edition heroes, the LIMITED EDITION PANZER IV HERO + LIMITED EDITION CRUSADER III HERO.  In addition, backers also get +2 BONUS PACKS (5 total), guaranteed ALPHA ACCESS, a BONUS DIGITAL GAME COPY and +3 MONTHS OF BOOSTED EXPERIENCE + WEALTH GAIN (6 months total).

MAJOR (IMMEDIATE ACCESS) \u2022 \r\nLimited offer! You get everything in MAJOR level plus ACCESS TO SPECIAL PLAYTEST SESSIONS with the dev team after Victory is successfully funded. You\u2019ll be able to play an early prototype version of the game!

MAJOR \u2022 \r\nIncludes CAPTAIN Level.  You will also receive +3 BONUS PACKS (8 total) and +1 BONUS DIGITAL GAME COPIES (2 total).  Further, you\u2019ll receive a UNIQUE ELITE FOUNDER TITLE on the forums and in game and unlock a unique ELITE FOUNDER PORTRAIT, and will get your NAME IN THE CREDITS as a contributor!

COLONEL (Collector\u2019s Edition) \u2022 \r\nIncludes MAJOR (IMMEDIATE ACCESS) Level.  You will also receive a physical COLLECTOR\u2019S BOX EDITION, complete with the game, VICTORY T-SHIRT, VICTORY MOUSEPAD, CUSTOM VICTORY DOG TAGS and VICTORY SOUNDTRACK CD.

BRIGADIER GENERAL \u2022 \r\nIncludes COLONEL level.  Instead of getting bonus packs you will get a COMPLETE LAUNCH COLLECTION, consisting of 2 of every unit (including all rares and ultra-rares) and ability that can be obtained in packs.  Additionally, you will get +2 BONUS DIGITAL GAME COPIES (4 total).

MAJOR GENERAL \u2022 Includes BRIGADIER GENERAL level.  In addition to the benefits of Brigadier General level, you will be able to PUT YOUR CHARACTER INTO THE GAME.  You will work with our team to name a custom hero based on an existing unit of your choice, which only you will be able to play with in the game.

GENERAL \u2022 Includes MAJOR GENERAL level.  You will also receive LIFETIME VIP STATUS, including BOOSTED EXPERIENCE + WEALTH GAIN.  Further, you will get a VICTORY POSTER SIGNED BY THE TEAM and special recognition in our credits as a member of the team!  You will also receive the exclusive ULTIMATE FOUNDER title in game and on the forums and a unique ULTIMATE FOUNDER PORTRAIT.

LIFETIME EDITION \u2022 Includes GENERAL level. In addition, you will receive a COMPLETE LIFETIME COLLECTION, consisting of 2 of every unit and ability (including all rares and ultra-rares), that can normally be obtained in packs, which we ever create for Victory after the initial launch!

FIELD MARSHAL \u2022 Includes LIFETIME EDITION. You will also get to meet the development team! STAY ON THE LAS VEGAS STRIP FOR 2 NIGHTS and MEET THE DEVS! We will bring you out to the Petroglyph studio for a tour, play session, and a meeting with our design team to discuss the game. But most importantly, we'll treat you to an exciting local WWII experience!
